mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T2_DEL_MEMBER (deleted_num, id, deleted_date, reason) VALUES (t2_deleted_num_seq.NEXTVAL, #{id}, SYSDATE, #{reason})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T2_MEMBER WHERE id LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
SELECT diary_number, diary_subject, diary_reg_date FROM t2_diary WHERE id=#{param1} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(diary_number) DESC

SELECT d.dest_num, d.dest_name, r.review_content, r.review_reg_data, ra.rating, r.review_num FROM t2_review r INNER JOIN t2_dest d ON r.dest_num = d.dest_num INNER JOIN t2_rating ra ON d.dest_num = ra.dest_num WHERE r.id=#{param1} ORDER BY r.review_reg_data DESC

SELECT dr.reply_num, dr.reply_content, dr.reply_reg_date, dr.diary_number, d.diary_subject FROM t2_diary_reply dr INNER JOIN t2_diary d ON dr.diary_number = d.diary_number WHERE dr.id = #{param1} ORDER BY dr.reply_num DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t2_rating WHERE id=#{param2} AND dest_num = (select dest_num from t2_review where review_num=#{param1})
